website_summaries.verdict: A classic shoe with a touch of modern technology comes the Converse Chuck II Low Top. As a successful make-over of the Chucks All Star, the shoe still keeps its classic image while providing enhanced comfort, better support, exact fit, and a more trendy appeal.Though the price of this kick is slightly higher compared to the original Chucks, it still falls directly at a budget-friendly price range. With the aesthetically classic vibe the Converse Chuck II Low Top gives off, one can never go wrong with these sneakers.
pros: The exceptional comfort from the Converse Chuck II Low Top is what the majority of the critics praised about the silhouette
A lot of the users said that the Chucks II has better cushioning compared to the original Chucks All Star
Several buyers were glad about the removable insert because according to them, it is easier for them to replace in case they find the Lunarlon inserts too thick
The ability of the shoe to correspond to various ensemble gave satisfaction to the consumers
The classic colorways of the Converse Chuck Taylor All Star are also offered for the Converse Chuck II Low Top
A handful of consumers noted that they definitely recommend the sneaker
The budget-friendly price point of the sneaker is favorable to many
cons: A few reviewers complained about the Converse Chuck II Low Top to be too narrow
One of the buyers pointed out that he/she got blisters when wearing the sneaker the first time and just for after about 30 minutes of wearing

customer_reviews.title: The last pair of sneakers you'll ever need
customer_reviews.text: I have large feet for a girl so ordered the mens, well that was my only option. Still they look like the female version, and a slim enough to not make my feet look like boats! Really comfortable and fit well. The support on them is great and you get white and black laces so you can change the look very easily
customer_reviews.author: H Nordhoff

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant Converse
customer_reviews.text: My 13 year old son was not too sure initially however once he tried them on he was converted. He says they are much more comfortable than the other normal converse he had. The springy insole is great
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ideal bridal shoes
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my wedding and they're perfect! I'm switching in satin laces but this is my gazillionth pair of Converse lo-tops and I can never fault them. It's my first all-white pair and they're great.
customer_reviews.author: BigAnnieG

customer_reviews.title: Very nice dark burgundy colour with cool textile structure
customer_reviews.text: Very nice dark burgundy colour with cool textile structure. Second generation Converse, so it feels sturdier while somewhat more comfortable. Second pair of laces is a welcome addition. Miss the old-fashioned black/blue band around sole, though - apart from that quite happy.
customer_reviews.author: julia

customer_reviews.title: size was surprisingly small for a uk 11. The ...
customer_reviews.text: size was surprisingly small for a uk 11. The new design seems to be smaller than the old one. Why would they change such a classic?
customer_reviews.author: james towell

customer_reviews.title: Overall they feel really good, but if you have a wide feet that ...
customer_reviews.text: Overall they feel really good, but if you have a wide feet that might be a little problem at first but it'll get comfy after a while.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: All good!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as expected! The photo is faithful to reality. Great that it also comes with additional black cords (although I’ll keep them white)
customer_reviews.author: Alejandro Fernández Haro

customer_reviews.title: Stylish & Classic
customer_reviews.text: Classic look, comfortable and size fitted as expected - recommended
customer_reviews.author: Ralph

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice one, not the usual converse, feel more like a gym shoe!
customer_reviews.author: Giggino

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great but come up small so suggest people order next size up x
customer_reviews.author: Shane H.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Were a true fit to size. Really comfy and just what I expected and more.
customer_reviews.author: Cara

customer_reviews.title: Ouch!
customer_reviews.text: So uncomfortable, hurt at the heels and toes, very tight! Unable to wear them and I have had converse before!
customer_reviews.author: MRS M J SMITH

product_meta.title: Converse Men's Ct Ii Ox Sneakers
product_meta.description: You pull your things through, and completely uncompromising. You're moving every day and love your chucks, but you demand more. We understand and present the Chuck Taylor All Star II. A cushioning ensures comfort during demanding applications. The sneaker has been improved in terms of fit and wearing comfort, but offers the usual look of the classic. No matter what you prefer, these sneakers do it all. The Lunarlon insole provides light, soft and responsive cushioning. The foam on the shoe collar and tongue ensures 360 degree comfort for a close, secure fit in the ankle and clamping area. So you enjoy excellent wearing comfort and can concentrate on the important things.
feature_bullets: Item is delivered with extra contarst color lace which are not displayed in images
